product_name: Carve Designs Zipper Line Hoodie - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A perfect layer for beach bonfires, the women's relaxed Zipper Line Hoodie from Carve Designs is soft and comfortable. Made from certified 100% organic cotton for breathable comfort and easy care. Full-length front zipper and long sleeves. Carve Designs Zipper Line Hoodie for women features a contrasting print lining in the hood. Semifitted construction enhances freedom of movement-it's not too tight, not too loose. Closeout.
short_description: A perfect layer for beach bonfires, the women's relaxed Zipper Line Hoodie from Carve Designs is soft and comfortable.
